Danube Kayaker Expeditions

Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits. Dream big.

Inside Passage 2023

Paddling the remotest part of the pacific coast of British Colombia on sea kayaks (July 7, 2023 - August 13, 2023)

Join an upcoming sea kayaking expedition. Explore the remotest places on our planet. Experience an adventure in the true wilderness. Challenge yourself. Push your boundaries. Learn something new. Become a contributing member with your skills and experiences, or support us from home.

Expedition: Tropical Southeast Asia Winter 2023 / Spring 2024

Explore the most remote places on Earth on folding sea kayaks.

Join the next adventure on traditional folding kayaks made of modern materials. A whole expedition packed only in backpacks able to reach any place in the world. Paddling among coral reefs, surrounded by tropical rainforest somewhere in Southeast Asia in the winter 2023 / spring of 2024.

Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits. Dream big.
